title: Portfolio
paragraphs: A single-page web application showcasing background, skills, and completed projects.
bullets: Solely designed and developed the entire site, programmed a filterable skills table, configured search engine optimization (SEO) meta tags, and implemented first render optimized image lazy loading.
Utilized GraphQL to query data (from local json or any cloud-based CMS) to generate project pages from a template and optimally resized images with a build script.
Built using CSS, Cloudflare, Gatsby.js, GitHub, GraphQL, JavaScript, Material-UI, React.js, and styled-components.
